familyMemberEthics.description: Another asset of Ivanka Trump's, KF-Centerview, LLC, is reportedly invested in Centerview Capital. However, Centerview Capital is not included in her 2017 financial disclosure. Because the investment vehicle reportedly has been divested, this record is categorized as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: Centerview Capital, LP; New York, NY

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $5,001 - $15,000 in Capital Gains income from KF-CENTERVIEW, LLC (Financial investments in Centerview Capital, LP; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF-Centerview, LLC (Financial Investments In Centerview Capital, LP; New York, NY)
